org.sensorhub.impl.sensor

Class DefaultLocationOutputLLA<SensorType extends ISensorModule<?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sensorhub.impl.sensor.AbstractSensorOutput<SensorType>
      • org.sensorhub.impl.sensor.DefaultLocationOutput<SensorType>
        • org.sensorhub.impl.sensor.DefaultLocationOutputLLA<SensorType>
  • Type Parameters:
    SensorType -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEventProducer, IStreamingDataInterface, ISensorDataInterface

    public class DefaultLocationOutputLLA<SensorType extends ISensorModule<?>>
extends DefaultLocationOutput<SensorType>

    Default WGS84 location output with latitude, longitude, altitude coordinates. Use of this class is highly recommended even for static sensors.

    Since:
    May 19, 2015
    Author:
    Alex Robin
